alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Fulton; Huntingdon; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:59PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT BEDFORD...SOUTHERN HUNTINGDON... FULTON AND SOUTHEASTERN SOMERSET COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM EDT... At 1158 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms extending from Meyersdale to 10 miles north of Frostburg. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bedford, Breezewood, Meyersdale, Berlin, Clearville, New Enterprise, Everett, McConnellsburg, Osterburg, Harrisonville, Buffalo Mills, Crystal Springs, Waterfall, Rockhill Furnace, Wells Tannery, Fort Littleton, Dudley, St. Clairsville, Valley-Hi and Cessna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
